best-practices.title: Best Practices
points: Expose the current value via aria-valuenow when building custom roles.
Ensure the slider can be operated via keyboard (Arrow keys, Home/End, PageUp/PageDown).
Provide clear min/max semantics and steps.
Maintain a large enough thumb for touch interactions.
Do not rely on color alone to convey value.
